Miriam Lerma’s website

About

Learn a little bit about me, my interests and find my contact information at the about section.

Publications

You can find abstracts and links to my publications. If you can’t access a publication please don’t hesitate to contact me.

Teaching

In this section, you will find a variety of topics that you might find interesting, such as AI tools, tracking functions, and selecting the right journal, among others. I’ve also prepared materials for teaching R, a programming language for statistical computing and graphics. If you’re interested in accessing these resources, you can locate them here.

Packages

I develop R packages that are useful for my work. I’m often working on new packages so stay tuned.

Blog

I blog about what I consider are useful topics and can help other people. I write mostly about R and QGIS, but some of my talks are there. I blog in English and Spanish.
